item.description:
Mayo Fuster Morell is a researcher at the European University Institute and School of Information at UC Berkeley who is doing doctoral research on the governance of online communities. She edits Wikipedia under the username Lilaroja and presented a Wikimedia governance case study at Wikimania this year. On top of all that, she's also organizing the first international forum on free culture and knowledge which will take place in Barcelona from October 29th to November 1st.

Mayo is in Boston for a cultural research workshop at the Berkman Center, and would like to take some time to meet with Boston wikifolk to discuss her research on Wikimedia. She will also bring info on the free culture forum she's involved in.

More info:

http://en.wikipedia.o...
http://fcforum.net/...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be waiting in the hallway outside for ten minutes - pink jacket, purple hat, pink laptop bag.
item.name: Special Guest: Mayo Fuster Morell/lilaroja
